summary:
A new standalone follower with custom textures and meshes.
Block Trainer, potential spouse, potential stewart
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img13/2295/tesvgrau1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img545/9405/tesvgrau4.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img33/393/coollogocom119482792.png[/IMG]
[color=#CC6600][b]I fixed the missing shield texture with either an optional or a new main file.

Kiera is a strong follower, who uses a shield and battle axe and can therefore also train your blocking skills. 
She can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. 
Additionally she\'s a potential spouse and stewart for your manor if you are using hearthfire dlc.
She starts at level 10 increases with the player and caps at 100.
The mod contains it\'s own custom textures and meshes for face and body, as well as weapon and shield. 
Thus it shouldn\'t conflict with any other mods you have installed.
Download section contains english and german file.
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/214/tesvgrau2.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img189/1531/coollogocom24158301.png[/IMG]
It\'s recommended to simply use Nexus Mod Manager.
Or download manually and extract the file, copy the .esp and all folders 
to <the elder scrolls v skyrim/data> and merge with any existing folder.[/b][/color]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/5094/tesvgrau3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img189/5966/coollogocom241581476.png[/IMG]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35655//?/] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img22/274/tesvgrau6emelia.jpg[/IMG] [/url]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img829/8340/coollogocom119482807.png[/IMG]
[color=#CC6600][b]apachii for her massive hair collection
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?/] apachii hair [/url]
dimon99 for his awesome UNP body
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?/] UNP body [/url]
hellosanta for her excellent female retexture
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267//?/] SG female retexture [/url]
kizbot for his great shield
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14076//?/] Viking Shield [/url]
ghosu for his awesome weapon pack
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28545//?/] Weapon Pack [/url]
[/b][/color]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img163/166/tesvgrau5.jpg[/IMG]
[/center]
author: Ztikul
